text: Sylvanus Timotheus Blackman (1 July 1933 - 23 January 2021) was a English male weightlifter. He was born in Bridgetown, Barbados. He competed at three Olympic Games in 1960, 1964 and 1968. Blackman died on 23 January 2021, aged 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British weightlifters Category:Barbadian sportspeople Category:Olympians for Great Britain
title: Sylvanus Blackman
